A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: There are moments in this movie that I love\, there are some that missed for me. Expands the mythology of the force in ways we have not seen before. All of the acting was top notch. A few sequences that feel misplaced but there some very iconic Star wars moments. The movie took alot of risks some really payed off others missed a bit\, but glad that the movie attempted the risks that it did.
